content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 16}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a stripped_spruce_wood, I need to place a stripped_spruce_log in the crafting grid. I will move the log from slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
